Sent: Friday, September 13, 2024 9:41 AM
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Good morning,

 

Please be informed that Carolina Herrera is opening new boutique in The Galleria Sowwah Mall tentatively first week of October 2024.

Each stakeholder is kindly requested to complete the opening task in timely manner to ensure smooth opening.

 

@Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com> 

*	Accounts registration and fees for Permanent power & water.
*	Accounts registration and fees for Telephone lines & internet.
*	Insurance certificates.

 

@Rawad Hossein <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>  @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com> 

*	CCTV & EAS system, and Safety & Security items LPOs are issued.
*	CCTV & EAS maintenance agreement AMC is signed and all in place.

 

@Ali Zeb Siyal <mailto:Alizeb.Siyal@chalhoub.com>  @Jayesh Jayadevan <mailto:Jayesh.Jayadevan@chalhoub.com>  @Faisal Abdukunju <mailto:Faisal.Abdukunju@chalhoub.com> 

*	Store's Tech & IT materials & equipment's LPOs are issued & all in place.
*	Music system software and equipment are in place.

 

@Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com> 

*	Fire Fighting/Safety & Security license issued & Archived.
*	Civil Defence license issued & Archived.
*	Trading license is issued & archived.
*	VAT Certification is delivered to the store.

 

@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 

*	Assets Insurance Policy is issued & confirmed with all insurance certificates needed ahead of opening.

From: Retail Operations UAE 
Sent: Friday, September 13, 2024 9:41 AM
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

Good morning,

 

Please be informed that Carolina Herrera is opening new boutique in The Galleria Sowwah Mall tentatively first week of October 2024.

Each stakeholder is kindly requested to complete the opening task in timely manner to ensure smooth opening.

 

@Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com> 

*	Accounts registration and fees for Permanent power & water.
*	Accounts registration and fees for Telephone lines & internet.
*	Insurance certificates.

 

@Rawad Hossein <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>  @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com> 

*	CCTV & EAS system, and Safety & Security items LPOs are issued.
*	CCTV & EAS maintenance agreement AMC is signed and all in place.

 

@Ali Zeb Siyal <mailto:Alizeb.Siyal@chalhoub.com>  @Jayesh Jayadevan <mailto:Jayesh.Jayadevan@chalhoub.com>  @Faisal Abdukunju <mailto:Faisal.Abdukunju@chalhoub.com> 

*	Store's Tech & IT materials & equipment's LPOs are issued & all in place.
*	Music system software and equipment are in place.

 

@Mohammed AL-AREQI <mailto:Mohammed.Al-areqi@chalhoub.com>  @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com> 

*	Fire Fighting/Safety & Security license issued & Archived.
*	Civil Defence license issued & Archived.
*	Trading license is issued & archived.
